text: Hello can i use python for development of a HubSpot custom app?? or Node.js or Yarn is necessary

Depends what custom app you're talking about.
If you're talking about CRM development projects then it's node.js.

Otherwise if you're talking about a custom app like those you can find on the app marketplace, then python or any other language will do since you'll host the code yourself.
The only prerequisite is that you are able to make API calls from your server to HubSpot.
then where we can write this python code of our custom app for marketplace. a framework for this development is required or we can write code for this app in a normal python file.
